EmailTemplate.subject: Delivery Hero - Your order has been cancelled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear (Enter name of the Customer),
Thank you for ordering with Delivery Hero.
We regret to inform you that your order {!Case.Subject} from {!Case.CreatedDate} could not be transferred to the restaurant.
Despite efforts we have been unable to reach you on the contact number provided.
If you'd like any more information on the matter please phone our friendly Customer Care Heroes on 1300 MY MEAL (1300 696 325).
Kind Regards,
The Delivery Hero Customer Care Team
